articles.title: Hang glider has near-death ride after realizing he’s not strapped in
articles.description: Chris Gursky was on the first day of a vacation to Switzerland when he decided to go hang gliding. He filmed what was expected to be a serene flight over Swiss forests and greenery, but instead turned into a nail-biting two minutes.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Video released shows the gender reveal party that sparked the Arizona wildfire
articles.description: An expecting father started the wildfire when he shot his rifle at a target packed with a blue substance and an explosive powder into a dry grassy area. It took 600 firefighters weeks to control the fire.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Heated Mississippi runoff election will bring a historical first
articles.description: The state will elect the first woman or the first African American in more than a century to the U.S. Senate.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: FDA approves the first cancer drug targeting a tumor solely based on its DNA, rather than location
articles.description: The drug is the first to treat at least 12 types of cancer that all have the same specific tumor mutation, including breast, lung and colon.  Scientists call it a major milestone in the battle against cancer.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Ukrainian President: ‘Russia will pay a huge price if they attack us’
articles.description: In an interview with NBC News’ Richard Engel, Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko warns of a possible wider war with Russia.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Inside the final frantic moments before the Lion Air crash
articles.description: New data from one of the plane’s black boxes indicated the pilots were in a dramatic fight with the plane’s computer, trying to keep the nose up, going up and down more than two dozen times, before finally crashing.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Three Dallas firefighters escape condo fire after being trapped inside
articles.description: The firefighters were pulled from the flames to safety by fellow firefighters and transported to hospitals along with a resident who suffered smoke inhalation.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Three U.S. service members killed in powerful Afghanistan blast
articles.description: Roadside bombing was the deadliest attack on US troops there in more than a year.

articles.title: Manafort denies allegations he met with Wikileaks’ Assange

articles.description: News spread of a shooting at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center on Tuesday, triggering a massive police response. But there was no shooter —  according to the U.S. Military, the alert was sent out by mistake.
